Name: Worse Than Death
About the game: A New Horror Adventure from the Creator of Home! Worse Than Death is a scary, action-adventure horror game about a high school reunion that goes horribly wrong! Run for your life, hide in the shadows, and use your wits to avoid shadowy creatures and uncover the terrible truths of your wretched home town. Solve devious puzzles to reveal the emotionally-charged story of Holly and her friends that will have you hooked until the very end! Main Features Action-adventure gameplay that sees you crawling under objects, vaulting over obstacles, and racing for the nearest hiding spot to stay safe Beautifully-drawn, challenging puzzles Horrible monsters that you can't see — but that you can track using lights, sound, and even Holly's own heartbeat Rich, 3D positional audio that will get under your skin Three difficulty modes (Normal, Hard and Nightmare) to test your mettle Full gameplay support for both keyboard/mouse and gamepads (Xbox 360/Xbox One, DualShock®4, Nintendo Switch Pro Controller) Steam Cloud support across both Windows and macOS
